attributes.action: Remove the utterly incompetent Steve McClaren from his position as England manager.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For the duration of his reign to date Steve McClaren has been an absolute disaster of an England Manager, and therefore should be removed immediatly. He appears to have no knowledge whatsoever of football, which is rather holding him back from doing his job, a job which i believe a poodle could do better. I urge you to sign this petition to voice your displeasure at his ability to perform his job.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
